Designing and developing a new type of submersible that can withstand the extreme pressures of the deep ocean and be equipped with advanced technology for scientific research and exploration.
Establishing a partnership with international organizations and governments to fund and support the mission, and to coordinate efforts for the safe and successful execution of the mission.
Developing a comprehensive training program for the crew of the submersible, including physical, mental, and technical training to ensure their safety and effectiveness in the deep ocean environment.
Creating a public awareness campaign to generate support and excitement for the mission, and to educate people about the importance of ocean exploration and conservation.

Collaborating with leading scientists and researchers to design and implement a scientific research plan for the mission, which could include studying the unique ecosystems and geological features of the deep ocean, as well as collecting samples for analysis and study on land.
